sentences.sentence: Bali is one of the world's great natural paradises.
sentences.translation: 巴厘岛是世界最大的自然乐园之一。

sentences.sentence: If it is true that the only paradises are those we have lost, I will know what name to give the tender and inhuman something that dwells in me today.
sentences.translation: 据说只有失去的才是乐园。 如果真是如此，我就知道怎样称呼今天停驻在我心中的、那温柔而不近人情的事物了。

sentences.sentence: The top 17 neighborhoods in San Francisco are Walkers' Paradises.
sentences.translation: 旧金山最好的17个居住区堪称“步行者的天堂”。
